-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/githubuser/BankingSystem#readme</a>
@package BankingSystem
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Module which contains the Customer datatype and associated print
--   functions
module Datatypes

-- | Customer datatype definition
data Customer
Customer :: String -> String -> MVar Rational -> Customer

-- | Stores name as a String
[name] :: Customer -> String

-- | Stores account number as a String
[accountNumber] :: Customer -> String

-- | Stores balance as an MVar Rational
[balance] :: Customer -> MVar Rational
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Datatypes.Customer


module PrintInfo

-- | Print balance of all customers
printFinalBalance :: [Customer] -> IO ()


-- | Module which contains functions to generate random values
module RandomPick

-- | Generate a random customer
randomCustomer :: [Customer] -> IO Customer

-- | Generate a random amount to transfer
randomAmount :: Customer -> IO Rational


-- | Module which contains functions to perform transactions
module Transactions

-- | Perform a transaction between two accounts
transferTransaction :: Customer -> Customer -> Rational -> IO ()


-- | Module which contains the Bank Account function
module BankAccount

-- | Deals with the transactions of each customer
bankAccountThread :: MVar Int -> Customer -> [Customer] -> MVar String -> IO ()
